question: Which tag would you use to make a heading for your tablerows?
How would you make a cell reach over 3 columns?
How would you submit a form?

answers.b: With a button with id submit
answers.d: With a buttom with name submit

question: Why should you use lables with a for attribute with your inputs?

answers.a: It allows assistive technologies to read your page
answers.b: Users can click the label to activate the input
answers.c: It gives a universal id to the input
answers.d: Both a and b are right
